section.title: XMLBeans Tools
section.p: XMLBeans Schema Tools (XMLBeans Version 1.0.3) This site allows XML Schema validation and compilation tools. You can submit an XML Schema (via file upload or cut and paste) or a set of XML Schemas (zip file) and you can download the resulting XMLBeans JAR file.
XMLBeans Schema Tools (XMLBeans Version 2.0) Same as above but for XMLBeans V2.0
Do you have or know of a tool that works with XMLBeans? Let us know and we will list it here.
